title: LOL season 6 provision
body:
I just finished my 10 matches and I won 6/10.
I ended last season at silver 1 and now i got placed in bronze 1!!
How can i go down by a whole rank??

replies.body: I won 3 lost 7 and got placed plat 4 but I was playing against diamond 4 players the whole time and I was rusty. Everyone else from d5 and d4 got placed in plat 4-plat5, and challenger players got placed plat 1. For example: scarra, C9 Sneaky.
Dude I won 6/10 and got B5 you should be happy :/
Was bronze 3 with bronze 1 mmr went 8-2 got bronze 4... Where is the logic in that
depends who u beat and who beat u. but tough break :/
